title: Comparative analysis in selecting best irrigation method to maximize tomato yield from various irrigation approaches in water scarce regions
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Solomon Mathewos Boltana, Tigistu Yisihak Ukumo, Tarun Kumar Lohani, Nahom Bekele Mena, Muluneh Legesse Edamo, Matusal Arja Alaro, Bereket Dora Doliso
